title: Metacognitive Strategy Application and Academic Achievement Enhancement in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and ability to use digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A program for working professionals aiming to improve language proficiency, where learners access non-real-time modules via LMS on personal devices and attend periodic offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can self-assess their learning processes at over 80% accuracy by applying metacognitive monitoring strategies in blended learning environments
Learners can set weekly learning goals and record their achievement status in a reflective journal at over 90% consistency
The experimental group achieves scores 15% higher than the control group in academic performance assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
